hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a #Big Skulltula# guarding a Gold one.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Bomb Bag#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Blue Fire Arrows#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Freestanding Key

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that racing #Damp√©'s ghost# rewards...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Heart Container#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Compass#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #6# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Megaton Hammer# can be found in #the Market#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Deku Stick#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Cojiro#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that crouch stabs mimic the effects of your last attack.

LH (Lab).text: Dear @, please come to the castle. I've baked a cake for you.&Yours truly, princess Zelda.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Cojiro#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Heart Container#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: Fell for it, didn't you, fool? Junk hint cross split attack!

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Slingshot#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb East Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Upper Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Broken Sword#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path of time.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #single Upgrade Deku Scrub#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #10# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
